channel.title: I Was Reincarnated into Another World and All I Want to do is Eat Steak
channel.description: The most powerful isekai protagonist ever born just wants to eat a damn steak.

item.title: Chapter 1
item.content:encoded:
Chapter 1

Oh…

What’s this?

I can barely move my body… it’s dark and warm…

Hm…

The last thing I remember was meeting Bus-kun on a fateful evening.

Splat.

…

Wait.

Didn’t I die?

That’s right. I died.

I became roadkill.

So, this must be the afterlife?

I was so happy…

I’d finally saved enough to be able to buy a nice, big steak.

Walking home on a cool summer evening.

Too distracted to even notice Bus-kun.

…

Bus-kun!!! You bastard!!!

Couldn’t you wait!

Don’t you know you should …
